abandon.mnemonic: a + band + on = 一个乐队散了(band弃了)
abandon.association: 想象一个乐队解散的场景

aberrant.mnemonic: ab(偏离) + err(错误) + ant = 偏离正道犯错的

abhor.mnemonic: ab(离开) + hor(恐惧horror) = 恐惧得离开,厌恶

abridge.mnemonic: a + bridge = 一座桥把两岸连起来,缩短距离

abstract.mnemonic: abs(离开) + tract(拉) = 从具体中抽离出来,抽象的
abstract.association: 把具体事物拉开变成概念

acclaim.mnemonic: ac(加强) + claim(喊叫) = 大声喊叫赞美

acerbic.mnemonic: acer(尖酸) + bic = 像柠檬一样尖酸刻薄
acerbic.association: 像未熟的柿子一样尖酸

acquiesce.mnemonic: ac + quie(安静quiet) + sce = 安静接受,默许

acrimony.mnemonic: acri(尖酸) + mony = 尖酸的金钱纠纷,激烈争执

adamant.mnemonic: adam(亚当) + ant = 像亚当一样坚定不移
adamant.association: 亚当面对诱惑时应该坚定
adamant.roots: 希腊语 adamas(无法征服的)

admonish.mnemonic: ad(to) + mon(提醒monitor) + ish = 提醒警告
admonish.association: 像监控器一样提醒警告

advocate.mnemonic: ad(to) + voc(声音) + ate = 为...发声,提倡

affable.mnemonic: af + fa(说fable) + ble = 能说话交谈的,和蔼的

affluent.mnemonic: af + flu(流) + ent = 财富流向你,富裕的

alacrity.mnemonic: a lack of rity = 毫不缺乏热情,敏捷热情

alleviate.mnemonic: al + lev(轻light) + iate = 使变轻,减轻

aloof.mnemonic: a + loof(roof屋顶) = 站在屋顶上,冷漠疏远

altruistic.mnemonic: altru(其他other) + istic = 为他人的,利他主义的

ambiguous.mnemonic: ambi(两边) + guous = 两边都有可能,模糊的

ameliorate.mnemonic: a + melior(更好) + ate = 使更好,改善

anomaly.mnemonic: a(无) + nom(规则) + aly = 没有规则,异常
anomaly.association: 不符合正常规律的事物

apathy.mnemonic: a(无) + pathy(感情) = 没有感情,冷漠

appease.mnemonic: ap + pease(和平peace) = 使和平,安抚

arcane.mnemonic: arc(弧,封闭) + ane = 被封闭的秘密,神秘的

arduous.mnemonic: ard(努力hard) + uous = 需要努力的,艰苦的

articulate.mnemonic: artic(关节joint) + ulate = 像关节一样灵活,清晰表达
articulate.association: 说话像关节一样流畅连贯

ascetic.mnemonic: asc(苦修) + etic = 苦修的,禁欲的

assiduous.mnemonic: assi(坐sit) + du(做do) + ous = 坐着努力做,勤勉的

attenuate.mnemonic: at + tenu(薄thin) + ate = 使变薄,削弱

audacious.mnemonic: aud(敢于dare) + acious = 敢于做的,大胆的

auspicious.mnemonic: au + spic(看) + ious = 从鸟看吉兆,吉利的

austere.mnemonic: aust(干燥) + ere = 干燥简朴,朴素严峻

banal.mnemonic: ban(禁止) + al = 被禁止创新的,平庸的

belligerent.mnemonic: bell(战争) + ger(带来) + ent = 带来战争的,好战的

benevolent.mnemonic: bene(好) + vol(意愿) + ent = 好意愿的,仁慈的

bolster.mnemonic: bolt(螺栓) + ster = 像螺栓一样加固支撑

bombastic.mnemonic: bomb(炸弹) + astic = 像炸弹一样夸张,浮夸的
bombastic.association: 说话像扔炸弹一样夸张

burgeon.mnemonic: bur(芽) + geon = 发芽,迅速发展

cacophony.mnemonic: caco(坏) + phon(声音) + y = 难听的声音,刺耳声

callous.mnemonic: call(叫) + ous = 怎么叫都不心软,冷酷的

candid.mnemonic: cand(白色,纯洁) + id = 纯洁坦率的

capricious.mnemonic: capri(山羊) + cious = 像山羊一样跳来跳去,反复无常

castigate.mnemonic: cast(纯洁) + ig + ate = 使纯洁,严惩

censure.mnemonic: cens(评价) + ure = 给予负面评价,谴责

circumspect.mnemonic: circum(周围) + spect(看) = 四周都看,谨慎的

clandestine.mnemonic: cland(秘密) + estine = 秘密的,暗中的

coalesce.mnemonic: co + alesce(成长) = 一起成长,合并

coerce.mnemonic: co(共同) + erce(力量force) = 用力量强迫,胁迫

cogent.mnemonic: cog(思考) + ent = 有思考的,有说服力的
cogent.association: 像齿轮(cog)一样环环相扣有逻辑

complacent.mnemonic: com + plac(高兴please) + ent = 非常高兴,自满的

concise.mnemonic: con + cise(切) = 把多余的切掉,简洁的

condone.mnemonic: con + done = 认为做了就算了,宽恕

confound.mnemonic: con + found(发现) = 发现一切都混乱了,困惑
confound.association: 各种事物混在一起让人困惑

conspicuous.mnemonic: con + spic(看) + uous = 大家都能看到,显眼的

contrite.mnemonic: con + trite(磨损) = 心被磨损,悔恨的

copious.mnemonic: cop(丰富) + ious = 丰富的,大量的

corroborate.mnemonic: cor + robor(力量robust) + ate = 增强力量,证实

craven.mnemonic: crave(渴望) + n = 渴望安全,胆小的

credulous.mnemonic: cred(相信) + ulous = 容易相信的,轻信的

cryptic.mnemonic: crypt(隐藏,地窖) + ic = 像地窖一样隐藏,神秘的

cursory.mnemonic: curs(跑run) + ory = 跑着看的,草率的

cynical.mnemonic: cyn(狗dog) + ical = 像狗一样吠叫批评,愤世嫉俗的

dearth.mnemonic: dear(珍贵) + th = 东西珍贵说明缺乏

debilitate.mnemonic: de(向下) + bil(能力ability) + itate = 能力下降,削弱

decry.mnemonic: de(向下) + cry = 向下喊叫,谴责

defunct.mnemonic: de(不) + funct(功能function) = 没有功能了,死的

deleterious.mnemonic: delete(删除) + rious = 像删除一样有害
deleterious.association: 删除健康的东西,有害的

delineate.mnemonic: de + line(线) + ate = 用线条勾勒,描述

demure.mnemonic: de + mure(成熟mature) = 成熟稳重,端庄的

denigrate.mnemonic: de + nigr(黑negro) + ate = 使变黑,诋毁

deplete.mnemonic: de(向下) + plete(充满complete) = 充满程度下降,耗尽

deride.mnemonic: de + ride(笑) = 向下笑,嘲笑

despondent.mnemonic: de(向下) + spond(承诺respond) + ent = 承诺落空,沮丧的

desultory.mnemonic: de + sult(跳) + ory = 跳来跳去的,漫无目的的

deter.mnemonic: de(向下) + ter(恐惧terror) = 用恐惧阻止

devious.mnemonic: de + vi(路via) + ous = 偏离正道的,狡猾的

didactic.mnemonic: did(教) + actic = 教导的,说教的

diffident.mnemonic: dif(不) + fid(信任faith) + ent = 不自信,羞怯的

digress.mnemonic: di(离开) + gress(走progress) = 走开话题,离题

diligent.mnemonic: dil(爱love) + ig + ent = 爱工作的,勤勉的

discern.mnemonic: dis + cern(分辨) = 分辨出来,识别

discord.mnemonic: dis(不) + cord(心heart) = 心不合,不和谐

disparage.mnemonic: dis + par(相等) + age = 使不相等,贬低

disparate.mnemonic: dis + par(相等) + ate = 不相等的,迥异的

disseminate.mnemonic: dis + semin(种子semen) + ate = 散播种子,传播

diverge.mnemonic: di(分开) + verge(转向) = 分道扬镳,分歧

divulge.mnemonic: di(分开) + vulge(大众vulgar) = 向大众公开,透露

docile.mnemonic: doc(教doctor) + ile = 容易被教导的,温顺的

dogmatic.mnemonic: dog(狗) + matic = 像狗一样固执己见,武断的

dubious.mnemonic: dub(两个double) + ious = 两个想法,怀疑的
dubious.association: 心里有两个声音在打架

ebullient.mnemonic: e(出) + bull(沸腾boil) + ient = 沸腾出来的,热情洋溢的

eccentric.mnemonic: ec(外) + centr(中心) + ic = 偏离中心,古怪的

eclectic.mnemonic: ec(出) + lect(选择select) + ic = 从各处选择,折衷的

edify.mnemonic: edi(建造edifice) + fy = 建造人格,教化

efface.mnemonic: ef(出) + face(脸) = 把脸抹掉,抹去

efficacious.mnemonic: ef + fic(做) + acious = 能做成事的,有效的

effusive.mnemonic: ef(出) + fus(流pour) + ive = 感情流出,热情洋溢的

egregious.mnemonic: e(出) + greg(群gregarious) + ious = 从群体中突出的,极坏的

elated.mnemonic: e(出) + lat(带carry) + ed = 被带上高处,兴高采烈的

elicit.mnemonic: e(出) + lic(引诱) + it = 引诱出来,引出

elucidate.mnemonic: e(出) + lucid(清楚) + ate = 使清楚,阐明

elusive.mnemonic: e(出) + lus(玩illusion) + ive = 像幻觉一样难以捉摸

emancipate.mnemonic: e + man(手) + cip(拿) + ate = 从手中释放,解放

eminent.mnemonic: e(出) + min(突出mountain) + ent = 突出的,杰出的

empirical.mnemonic: em + pir(经验) + ical = 来自经验的,经验主义的

emulate.mnemonic: em + ul(超过) + ate = 努力超过,效仿

endemic.mnemonic: en(在内) + dem(人民democracy) + ic = 在某群人中的,地方性的

enervate.mnemonic: e(出) + nerv(神经nerve) + ate = 抽走神经,使虚弱

enigmatic.mnemonic: enigma(谜) + tic = 像谜一样神秘
enigmatic.association: 像斯芬克斯的谜一样难解

ephemeral.mnemonic: epher(一天) + meral = 只有一天的,短暂的

equanimity.mnemonic: equ(平等) + anim(心灵) + ity = 心态平和,镇定

equivocal.mnemonic: equi(平等) + voc(声音) + al = 两种声音一样,模棱两可的

eradicate.mnemonic: e(出) + radic(根root) + ate = 连根拔出,根除

erratic.mnemonic: err(错误error) + atic = 到处犯错的,不规律的

erudite.mnemonic: e + rud(粗糙rude) + ite = 去除粗糙的,博学的

esoteric.mnemonic: eso(内部) + teric = 内部的,深奥的

ethereal.mnemonic: ether(以太) + eal = 像以太一样轻盈,飘渺的

exacerbate.mnemonic: ex + acer(尖锐acrid) + bate = 使更尖锐,恶化

exonerate.mnemonic: ex + oner(负担onerous) + ate = 从负担中解脱,免除

expedient.mnemonic: ex + ped(脚foot) + ient = 解放脚的,权宜的

extol.mnemonic: ex + tol(举起toll) = 高高举起,赞美

exuberant.mnemonic: ex(加强) + uber(丰富) + ant = 非常丰富,热情洋溢的

facilitate.mnemonic: facil(容易) + itate = 使容易,促进

fallacious.mnemonic: fall(跌落) + acious = 跌入错误的,谬误的

fastidious.mnemonic: fast(快) + id + ious = 快速挑剔,苛求的

fathom.mnemonic: fat(脂肪) + hom = 深到连脂肪都能感到,理解深度

fervent.mnemonic: ferv(沸腾fever) + ent = 像发烧一样热情

fickle.mnemonic: f + ickle(tickle挠痒) = 像被挠痒一样变来变去

flagrant.mnemonic: flag(旗帜) + rant = 像挥舞旗帜一样明目张胆

florid.mnemonic: flor(花flower) + id = 像花一样,华丽的

foment.mnemonic: fo + ment(提到mention) = 反复提及煽动

forthright.mnemonic: forth(向前) + right(正确) = 直接说对的,直率的

fortuitous.mnemonic: fortuit(偶然) + ous = 偶然的,意外的

frugal.mnemonic: frug(果实fruit) + al = 只吃果实不浪费,节俭的

furtive.mnemonic: furt(偷) + ive = 偷偷摸摸的,鬼鬼祟祟的

garrulous.mnemonic: garr(叫) + ulous = 爱叫的,饶舌的

gregarious.mnemonic: greg(群) + arious = 爱群居的,合群的

guile.mnemonic: gui(鬼) + le = 像鬼一样狡猾,诡计

hackneyed.mnemonic: hack(砍) + neyed = 被反复砍用,陈腐的

hamper.mnemonic: ham(火腿) + per = 火腿太重妨碍行动

haughty.mnemonic: haugh(高high) + ty = 高高在上,傲慢的

hedonistic.mnemonic: hedon(快乐) + istic = 追求快乐的,享乐主义的

heretic.mnemonic: here(这里) + tic = 站在这里不随大流,异端者

heterogeneous.mnemonic: hetero(不同) + gen(产生) + eous = 产生不同的,异质的

hierarchy.mnemonic: hier(神圣) + arch(统治) + y = 神圣的统治顺序,等级制度

hyperbole.mnemonic: hyper(超过) + bole(投) = 夸大其词,夸张

impartial.mnemonic: im(不) + partial(偏向) = 不偏向的,公正的

imperative.mnemonic: im + per(通过) + ative = 必须通过的,紧迫的

impetuous.mnemonic: im + pet(冲) + uous = 猛冲的,冲动的

implicit.mnemonic: im(在内) + plic(折叠) + it = 折叠在内的,含蓄的

indigenous.mnemonic: indi(内部) + gen(产生) + ous = 内部产生的,本土的

indolent.mnemonic: in(不) + dol(痛苦dolor) + ent = 不觉得痛苦就不动,懒惰的

ingenious.mnemonic: in + gen(产生genius) + ious = 有天才产生的,巧妙的

ingenuous.mnemonic: in + gen + uous = 天生的本性,天真的

inherent.mnemonic: in(在内) + her(粘附here) + ent = 粘附在内的,固有的

innocuous.mnemonic: in(不) + noc(伤害) + uous = 不会伤害的,无害的

insidious.mnemonic: in + sid(坐) + ious = 坐在暗处的,阴险的

insipid.mnemonic: in(不) + sip(味道sapid) + id = 没有味道的,乏味的

intrepid.mnemonic: in(不) + trep(颤抖) + id = 不颤抖的,勇敢的

intricate.mnemonic: in + tric(复杂trick) + ate = 充满花招的,复杂的

inundate.mnemonic: in + und(波浪wave) + ate = 波浪涌入,淹没

invective.mnemonic: in + vect(带来) + ive = 带来攻击的言语,辱骂

irascible.mnemonic: ira(愤怒ire) + scible = 容易愤怒的,易怒的

judicious.mnemonic: jud(判断judge) + icious = 有判断力的,明智的

laconic.mnemonic: lac + onic = 像拉科尼亚人一样简洁

languish.mnemonic: lang(疲倦) + uish = 无精打采,衰弱

laud.mnemonic: l + aud(听audience) = 让大家听到赞美

loquacious.mnemonic: loqu(说talk) + acious = 爱说话的,健谈的

lucid.mnemonic: luc(光light) + id = 像光一样清晰,清楚的

magnanimous.mnemonic: magn(大) + anim(心灵) + ous = 心胸宽大的,宽宏大量的

malevolent.mnemonic: mal(坏) + vol(意愿) + ent = 坏意愿的,恶意的

malleable.mnemonic: mall(锤打) + eable = 可以锤打的,可塑的

meticulous.mnemonic: meti(害怕) + culous = 害怕出错,一丝不苟的

mitigate.mnemonic: mit(温和mild) + ig + ate = 使温和,缓解

mollify.mnemonic: moll(软soft) + ify = 使软化,安抚

obdurate.mnemonic: ob(加强) + dur(硬durable) + ate = 非常硬的,顽固的

opaque.mnemonic: op + aque = 看不透的,不透明的

palliate.mnemonic: pall(遮盖) + iate = 用外衣遮盖,减轻

panacea.mnemonic: pan(全部) + acea(治愈) = 治愈一切的,万能药

paradigm.mnemonic: para(旁边) + digm(展示) = 展示在旁边作为参考,典范

parochial.mnemonic: par + ochial(教区) = 像小教区一样,狭隘的

partisan.mnemonic: part(部分) + isan = 属于某一部分的,党派的

pedantic.mnemonic: ped(教育) + antic = 过分强调教育的,迂腐的

penchant.mnemonic: pen(倾斜) + chant = 心向往之,爱好

pernicious.mnemonic: per(完全) + nic(杀) + ious = 完全致命的,有害的

perspicacious.mnemonic: per + spic(看) + acious = 看透一切的,敏锐的

pervasive.mnemonic: per(全面) + vas(走) + ive = 走遍各处的,普遍的

petulant.mnemonic: pet(请求) + ulant = 不断请求的,易怒的

phenomenon.mnemonic: phen(显示) + omen + on = 显示出来的现象

phlegmatic.mnemonic: phlegm(黏液) + atic = 像黏液一样迟缓,冷淡的

placate.mnemonic: plac(平静please) + ate = 使平静,安抚

platitude.mnemonic: plat(平flat) + itude = 平淡无奇的话,陈词滥调

plethora.mnemonic: pleth(充满) + ora = 充满的,过量

polemical.mnemonic: polem(战争) + ical = 像战争一样的,争论的

pragmatic.mnemonic: pragma(行动) + tic = 注重行动的,务实的

precipitate.mnemonic: pre(向前) + cipit(头) + ate = 头朝下冲,仓促的

precursor.mnemonic: pre(在前) + curs(跑) + or = 跑在前面的,先驱

predilection.mnemonic: pre + di + lect(选择) + ion = 预先选择的,偏爱

prescient.mnemonic: pre(提前) + sci(知道) + ent = 提前知道的,有先见之明的

presumptuous.mnemonic: pre + sumpt(拿assume) + uous = 提前拿走的,放肆的

pretentious.mnemonic: pre + tent(伸展) + ious = 过分伸展的,做作的

prevalent.mnemonic: pre + val(力量) + ent = 有力量占上风的,流行的

probity.mnemonic: prob(正直prove) + ity = 经得起检验的正直,诚实

proclivity.mnemonic: pro(向前) + cliv(倾斜) + ity = 向某方向倾斜,倾向

prodigal.mnemonic: pro(向前) + dig(驱赶) + al = 驱赶出去的钱,挥霍的

profound.mnemonic: pro(向前) + found(基础) = 深入基础的,深刻的

proliferate.mnemonic: pro + lifer(后代) + ate = 产生后代,激增

propensity.mnemonic: pro + pens(悬挂) + ity = 悬向某方向,倾向

propitiate.mnemonic: pro + piti(有利) + ate = 使有利,取悦

prosaic.mnemonic: pros(散文prose) + aic = 像散文一样的,平淡的

proscribe.mnemonic: pro + scribe(写) = 写出来公布禁止,禁止

protean.mnemonic: Prote(普罗透斯) + an = 像普罗透斯一样,多变的

provincial.mnemonic: pro + vinc(征服) + ial = 被征服的地区,狭隘的

prudent.mnemonic: prud(智慧provide) + ent = 有智慧的,谨慎的

querulous.mnemonic: quer(抱怨) + ulous = 爱抱怨的,爱发牢骚的

quiescent.mnemonic: qui(安静quiet) + escent = 变安静的,静止的

quotidian.mnemonic: quot(每天quote) + idian = 每天的,日常的

rancor.mnemonic: ranc(恶臭) + or = 像恶臭一样令人厌恶,怨恨

raucous.mnemonic: rauc(沙哑) + ous = 声音沙哑的,刺耳的

recalcitrant.mnemonic: re + calc(踢) + itrant = 向后踢的马,倔强的

recondite.mnemonic: re + cond(藏hide) + ite = 藏起来的,深奥的

redundant.mnemonic: re + dund(波浪) + ant = 波浪反复涌来,冗余的

refute.mnemonic: re + fute(打beat) = 反击回去,反驳

relegate.mnemonic: re + leg(派送) + ate = 派送到远处,贬黜

relentless.mnemonic: re + lent(软化) + less = 不软化的,无情的

relinquish.mnemonic: re + linqu(离开leave) + ish = 离开,放弃

reprehensible.mnemonic: re + prehens(抓) + ible = 应该被抓住惩罚的,应受谴责的

repudiate.mnemonic: re + pudi(羞耻) + ate = 因羞耻而拒绝,否认

rescind.mnemonic: re + scind(切) = 切断协议,废除

reticent.mnemonic: re + tic(沉默tacit) + ent = 保持沉默的,沉默寡言的

reverent.mnemonic: rever(敬畏) + ent = 充满敬畏的,虔诚的

rhetoric.mnemonic: rhet(说) + oric = 说话的艺术,修辞

rudimentary.mnemonic: rudi(原始) + ment + ary = 原始的,基本的

sacrosanct.mnemonic: sacro(神圣) + sanct(神圣) = 双重神圣,不可侵犯的

sagacious.mnemonic: sag(智慧sage) + acious = 像智者一样,睿智的

salubrious.mnemonic: salub(健康salute) + rious = 有益健康的

sanguine.mnemonic: sangu(血) + ine = 血气方刚的,乐观的

sardonic.mnemonic: sardon(撒丁岛) + ic = 撒丁岛有毒草使人笑,讥讽的

scrupulous.mnemonic: scrup(小石子) + ulous = 连小石子都注意,一丝不苟的

secular.mnemonic: secul(世俗) + ar = 世俗的,非宗教的

sedulous.mnemonic: sed(坐) + ulous = 坐着努力工作,勤勉的

sententious.mnemonic: sent(感觉) + entious = 充满深意的,说教的

soporific.mnemonic: sopor(睡眠) + ific = 导致睡眠的,催眠的

specious.mnemonic: spec(看) + ious = 看起来好的,似是而非的

sporadic.mnemonic: spor(散播) + adic = 散播各处的,零星的

spurious.mnemonic: spur(假冒) + ious = 假冒的,虚假的

stolid.mnemonic: stol(傻) + id = 像傻了一样,迟钝的

strident.mnemonic: strid(刺耳) + ent = 刺耳的,尖锐的

stringent.mnemonic: string(绳子) + ent = 用绳子勒紧的,严格的

subservient.mnemonic: sub(在下) + serv(服务) + ient = 在下面服务,卑躬屈膝的

substantiate.mnemonic: sub + stant(站) + iate = 站在下面支撑,证实

subtle.mnemonic: sub(在下) + tle = 在下面不易察觉的,微妙的

succinct.mnemonic: suc + cinct(束紧) = 束紧的,简洁的

superficial.mnemonic: super(表面) + fic(做) + ial = 只做表面的,肤浅的

superfluous.mnemonic: super(超过) + flu(流) + ous = 流出来的,多余的

supine.mnemonic: sup(在下) + ine = 躺在下面,消极的

supplant.mnemonic: sup + plant(种植) = 种上新的取代旧的,取代

sycophant.mnemonic: syco(无花果) + phant(展示) = 告发无花果贼,谄媚者

tacit.mnemonic: tac(沉默) + it = 沉默的,心照不宣的

taciturn.mnemonic: tacit(沉默) + urn = 沉默寡言的

tangential.mnemonic: tang(接触touch) + ential = 只接触一点的,离题的

tantamount.mnemonic: tant(那么多) + amount = 那么多数量,等于

tenacious.mnemonic: ten(抓住) + acious = 抓住不放的,顽强的

tenet.mnemonic: ten(持有) + et = 持有的信念,原则

tenuous.mnemonic: tenu(薄thin) + ous = 薄的,脆弱的

tirade.mnemonic: ti + rade(射击) = 连珠炮式射击,长篇大论

torpid.mnemonic: torp(麻木) + id = 麻木的,迟钝的

transient.mnemonic: trans(穿过) + ient = 穿过就走的,短暂的

trepidation.mnemonic: trep(颤抖intrepid) + idation = 颤抖,恐惧

truculent.mnemonic: truc(凶猛) + ulent = 凶猛的,好斗的

ubiquitous.mnemonic: ubi(哪里) + quit(everywhere) + ous = 哪里都有的,无处不在的

unequivocal.mnemonic: un + equi(相等) + voc(声音) + al = 声音不含糊的,明确的

untenable.mnemonic: un + ten(持有) + able = 无法持有的,站不住脚的

vacillate.mnemonic: vac(摇摆) + illate = 摇摆不定,犹豫

vapid.mnemonic: vap(蒸发) + id = 精华蒸发了,乏味的

vehement.mnemonic: veh(运送vehicle) + ement = 有力运送的,激烈的

venal.mnemonic: ven(卖sell) + al = 可以卖的,贪污的

venerate.mnemonic: vener(爱Venus) + ate = 像爱维纳斯一样,崇敬

veracious.mnemonic: ver(真实very) + acious = 真实的,诚实的

verbose.mnemonic: verb(词word) + ose = 词多的,冗长的

vestige.mnemonic: vest(痕迹vest) + ige = 残留的痕迹,遗迹

viable.mnemonic: vi(生命life) + able = 有生命力的,可行的

vicarious.mnemonic: vicar(代理人) + ious = 代理的,间接体验的

vindicate.mnemonic: vind(力量) + icate = 用力证明,证明无辜

virtuoso.mnemonic: virtu(品德virtue) + oso = 有品德技艺的,大师

vitriolic.mnemonic: vitriol(硫酸) + ic = 像硫酸一样刻薄的,尖刻的

vociferous.mnemonic: voc(声音voice) + ifer(带来) + ous = 大声带来的,喧闹的

volatile.mnemonic: volat(飞fly) + ile = 能飞走的,易变的

zealous.mnemonic: zeal(热情) + ous = 充满热情的,狂热的

abstain.mnemonic: abs(离开) + tain(持有) = 不持有,戒绝

abstruse.mnemonic: abs(离开) + truse(推thrust) = 推得很远,深奥的

accolade.mnemonic: ac + coll(脖子collar) + ade = 挂在脖子上的奖章,荣誉

acrid.mnemonic: acr(尖锐acre) + id = 尖锐刺鼻的,辛辣的

aggrandize.mnemonic: ag + grand(大) + ize = 使变大,夸大

allay.mnemonic: al + lay(放下) = 放下担心,减轻

amalgamate.mnemonic: a + malga(混合) + mate = 混合在一起,合并

amenable.mnemonic: amen(阿门) + able = 像说阿门一样顺从,顺从的

anachronistic.mnemonic: ana(错误) + chron(时间) + istic = 时间错误的,时代错误的

anathema.mnemonic: ana(向上) + thema(放置) = 被高高放起诅咒,令人厌恶之物

antipathy.mnemonic: anti(反对) + pathy(感情) = 反对的感情,反感

apocryphal.mnemonic: apo(远离) + cryph(隐藏) + al = 隐藏起来的,可疑的

approbation.mnemonic: ap + prob(证明prove) + ation = 证明好的,赞同

arbitrary.mnemonic: arbitr(仲裁) + ary = 仲裁者说了算,武断的

assuage.mnemonic: as + suage(甜suave) = 使变甜,缓解

avarice.mnemonic: avar(贪婪) + ice = 贪婪,贪财

belie.mnemonic: be + lie(谎言) = 用谎言掩盖,掩饰

bellicose.mnemonic: bell(战争) + icose = 爱战争的,好战的

beneficent.mnemonic: bene(好) + fic(做) + ent = 做好事的,仁慈的

boorish.mnemonic: boor(农夫) + ish = 像农夫一样粗鲁的,粗野的

buttress.mnemonic: butt(撞击) + ress = 撞击支撑,支持

canonical.mnemonic: canon(规则) + ical = 符合规则的,经典的

catalyst.mnemonic: cata(向下) + lyst(解开) = 向下解开加速反应,催化剂

chauvinism.mnemonic: Chauvin(沙文) + ism = 沙文主义,盲目爱国

chicanery.mnemonic: chic(时髦) + anery = 时髦的欺骗,诡计

circuitous.mnemonic: circuit(环路) + ous = 绕圈子的,迂回的

codify.mnemonic: cod(代码code) + ify = 编成法典,编纂

commensurate.mnemonic: com + mensur(测量measure) + ate = 一起测量,相称的

compendium.mnemonic: com + pend(称重) + ium = 一起称重的,概要

compliant.mnemonic: com + pli(弯曲) + ant = 弯曲顺从,顺从的

connoisseur.mnemonic: conn(知道) + oisseur = 知道很多的人,鉴赏家

consecrate.mnemonic: con + secr(神圣sacred) + ate = 使神圣,奉献

consummate.mnemonic: con + summ(最高sum) + ate = 达到最高,完美的

contentious.mnemonic: con + tent(拉伸) + ious = 互相拉扯的,有争议的

convoluted.mnemonic: con + volut(卷roll) + ed = 卷在一起的,复杂的

covet.mnemonic: cov(渴望) + et = 强烈渴望,觊觎

decorum.mnemonic: decor(装饰) + um = 装饰得当,礼仪

deference.mnemonic: de + fer(带来) + ence = 带来尊重,敬重

demur.mnemonic: de + mur(拖延) = 拖延反对,反对

denounce.mnemonic: de(向下) + nounce(宣布) = 向下宣布,谴责

depravity.mnemonic: de + prav(歪曲) + ity = 歪曲道德,堕落

deprecate.mnemonic: de + prec(祈祷) + ate = 祈祷远离,反对

derivative.mnemonic: de + riv(河流river) + ative = 从河流来的,衍生的

desiccate.mnemonic: de + sicc(干燥) + ate = 使变干,干燥

diffidence.mnemonic: dif(不) + fid(信任faith) + ence = 不自信,羞怯

dilatory.mnemonic: di + lat(带来) + ory = 拖延带来的,拖延的

dilettante.mnemonic: dilett(喜爱delight) + ante = 喜爱但不精通,业余爱好者

disabuse.mnemonic: dis(去除) + abuse(误用) = 去除误解,使醒悟

discordant.mnemonic: dis(不) + cord(心) + ant = 心不一致的,不和谐的

dispassionate.mnemonic: dis(不) + passion(激情) + ate = 没有激情的,冷静的

dissemble.mnemonic: dis + semble(相似resemble) = 使不相似,掩饰

dissolution.mnemonic: dis + solut(松开) + ion = 松开分解,解散

dissonance.mnemonic: dis(不) + son(声音sound) + ance = 声音不和谐,不和谐

effervescent.mnemonic: ef + ferv(沸腾fervent) + escent = 沸腾冒泡的,兴奋的

efficacy.mnemonic: ef + fic(做) + acy = 能做出效果的,功效

effrontery.mnemonic: ef + front(前额forehead) + ery = 把脸凑上去,厚颜无耻

elaborate.mnemonic: e + labor(劳动) + ate = 用心劳动的,精心制作的

eloquent.mnemonic: e(出) + loqu(说) + ent = 说得好的,雄辩的

embellish.mnemonic: em + bell(美丽belle) + ish = 使美丽,修饰

engender.mnemonic: en + gender(产生) = 产生,引起

enmity.mnemonic: en + mity(敌意enemy) = 敌意,仇恨

enumerate.mnemonic: e + numer(数number) + ate = 一个个数出来,列举

eschew.mnemonic: es + chew(咀嚼) = 吐出不嚼,避开

espouse.mnemonic: e + spouse(配偶) = 像娶妻一样拥护,支持

euphemism.mnemonic: eu(好) + phem(说) + ism = 说好话,委婉语

exacting.mnemonic: ex + act(行动) + ing = 强迫行动的,严格的

exculpate.mnemonic: ex(出) + culp(罪culprit) + ate = 从罪中出来,开脱

exemplary.mnemonic: ex + empl(范例example) + ary = 可作范例的,模范的

exigent.mnemonic: ex + ig(驱动) + ent = 驱动迫切的,紧急的

explicit.mnemonic: ex + plic(折叠) + it = 展开的,明确的

extant.mnemonic: ex + tant(站stand) = 站着存在的,现存的

extemporaneous.mnemonic: ex + tempor(时间) + aneous = 超出时间准备的,即兴的

extraneous.mnemonic: extra(外部) + neous = 外部的,无关的

fatuous.mnemonic: fat(胖) + uous = 脑袋肥,愚蠢的

fecund.mnemonic: fe + cund(产生) = 能产生的,多产的

fervid.mnemonic: ferv(沸腾) + id = 沸腾的,狂热的

forestall.mnemonic: fore(前) + stall(阻止) = 提前阻止,预防

fractious.mnemonic: fract(打破) + ious = 爱打破规矩的,易怒的

glib.mnemonic: g + lib(舌头lip) = 舌头灵活的,油嘴滑舌的

grandiloquent.mnemonic: grand(大) + loqu(说) + ent = 说大话的,夸张的

gratuitous.mnemonic: grat(感谢) + uitous = 免费给的,无理由的

hapless.mnemonic: hap(运气) + less = 没运气的,不幸的

harangue.mnemonic: har + angue(长话) = 长篇大论的训斥

impassive.mnemonic: im(不) + passive(被动) = 不被感情影响的,冷漠的

impervious.mnemonic: im(不) + perv(穿过) + ious = 穿不过的,不受影响的

implacable.mnemonic: im(不) + plac(平静please) + able = 不能平静的,不能安抚的

impute.mnemonic: im + pute(思考compute) = 往某人身上想,归咎于

inchoate.mnemonic: in + cho(开始) + ate = 刚开始的,初期的

incorrigible.mnemonic: in(不) + corrig(改正correct) + ible = 不能改正的,屡教不改的

indifferent.mnemonic: in(不) + different(不同) = 无差别对待,漠不关心的

indignant.mnemonic: in(不) + dign(尊严dignity) + ant = 不受尊重的,愤怒的

indomitable.mnemonic: in(不) + domit(驯服) + able = 不能驯服的,不屈的

indulgent.mnemonic: in + dulg(甜sweet) + ent = 给甜的,纵容的

ineluctable.mnemonic: in(不) + e + luct(挣扎) + able = 无法挣脱的,不可避免的

inexorable.mnemonic: in(不) + exor(祈求) + able = 祈求也没用的,无情的

inimical.mnemonic: in + imic(敌人enemy) + al = 敌对的,有害的

inscrutable.mnemonic: in(不) + scrut(检查) + able = 无法检查的,难以理解的

insolent.mnemonic: in(不) + sol(习惯) + ent = 不习惯服从的,傲慢的

instigate.mnemonic: in + stig(刺激) + ate = 刺激促使,煽动

integrity.mnemonic: in + tegr(完整integer) + ity = 完整性,正直

interminable.mnemonic: in(不) + termin(结束terminate) + able = 不能结束的,无止境的

intractable.mnemonic: in(不) + tract(拉) + able = 拉不动的,难对付的

intransigent.mnemonic: in(不) + trans(穿过) + ig + ent = 不让穿过的,不妥协的

inveterate.mnemonic: in + veter(老veteran) + ate = 根深蒂固的

invidious.mnemonic: in + vid(看video) + ious = 看了嫉妒的,惹人反感的

jocular.mnemonic: joc(笑话joke) + ular = 爱说笑话的,诙谐的

juxtapose.mnemonic: juxta(旁边) + pose(放置) = 放在旁边,并列

labyrinthine.mnemonic: labyrinth(迷宫) + ine = 像迷宫一样,错综复杂的

lachrymose.mnemonic: lachrym(眼泪) + ose = 爱流泪的,悲伤的

latent.mnemonic: lat(隐藏) + ent = 隐藏的,潜在的

laudable.mnemonic: laud(赞美) + able = 值得赞美的,值得称赞的

litigate.mnemonic: lit(争论) + ig + ate = 争论打官司,诉讼

malfeasance.mnemonic: mal(坏) + feas(做) + ance = 做坏事,不法行为

malign.mnemonic: mal(坏) + ign = 坏意图的,诽谤

maverick.mnemonic: Maverick = 不打烙印的牛,特立独行的人

mendacious.mnemonic: mend(补) + acious = 补漏洞说谎的,虚假的

mercurial.mnemonic: mercury(水银) + ial = 像水银一样善变,多变的

misanthrope.mnemonic: mis(恨hate) + anthrop(人) + e = 恨人类的人,厌世者

modicum.mnemonic: mod(适度) + icum = 适度的量,少量

momentous.mnemonic: moment(时刻) + ous = 重要时刻的,重大的

moribund.mnemonic: mor(死亡mortal) + ibund = 即将死亡的,垂死的

morose.mnemonic: mor(忧郁) + ose = 忧郁的,阴沉的

munificent.mnemonic: mun(给予) + ific + ent = 给予多的,慷慨的

nonchalant.mnemonic: non(不) + chal(在乎) + ant = 不在乎的,冷淡的

oblivious.mnemonic: ob + liv(忘记) + ious = 完全忘记的,不在意的

officious.mnemonic: offic(职务office) + ious = 过分尽职的,多管闲事的

ominous.mnemonic: omin(预兆omen) + ous = 有不好预兆的,不祥的

opprobrium.mnemonic: op + prob(羞耻) + rium = 强烈羞耻,耻辱

ornate.mnemonic: orn(装饰) + ate = 装饰过的,华丽的

orthodox.mnemonic: ortho(正确) + dox(信仰) = 正确信仰的,正统的

ossify.mnemonic: oss(骨头) + ify = 变成骨头,僵化

painstaking.mnemonic: pains(辛苦) + taking = 承受辛苦的,煞费苦心的

palpable.mnemonic: palp(触摸) + able = 可触摸的,明显的

panegyric.mnemonic: pan(全部) + egyr(聚会) + ic = 全体聚会赞美,颂词

parsimonious.mnemonic: pars(节省) + imonious = 过分节省的,吝啬的

pedant.mnemonic: ped(教育) + ant = 卖弄学问的人,学究

pellucid.mnemonic: pel + lucid(清晰lucid) = 非常清晰的,透明的

penitent.mnemonic: pen(惩罚penalty) + itent = 受惩罚悔改的,忏悔的

penurious.mnemonic: pen(缺乏) + urious = 缺乏的,贫穷的

perfidy.mnemonic: per(完全) + fid(信任faith) + y = 完全不信任,背信弃义

perfunctory.mnemonic: per + funct(完成function) + ory = 只是完成任务的,敷衍的

peripatetic.mnemonic: peri(周围) + pat(走path) + etic = 到处走的,巡回的

pertinacious.mnemonic: per + tin(持有) + acious = 紧紧持有的,顽强的

pervade.mnemonic: per(全面) + vade(走) = 走遍各处,弥漫

philistine.mnemonic: Philistine(非利士人) = 无文化的人,庸人

pious.mnemonic: pi(虔诚) + ous = 虔诚的,虔敬的

pithy.mnemonic: pith(髓) + y = 像髓一样精华,精辟的

placid.mnemonic: plac(平静please) + id = 平静的,温和的

plaintive.mnemonic: plain(抱怨complain) + tive = 抱怨的,哀伤的

plenitude.mnemonic: plen(满plenty) + itude = 充满的状态,丰富

ponderous.mnemonic: ponder(思考) + ous = 需要思考的重,笨重的

portentous.mnemonic: port(携带) + ent + ous = 携带预兆的,不祥的

precarious.mnemonic: prec(祈祷) + arious = 需要祈祷的,不稳定的

preclude.mnemonic: pre + clude(关闭close) = 提前关闭,阻止

precocious.mnemonic: pre(提前) + coc(煮cook) + ious = 提前煮熟的,早熟的

preternatural.mnemonic: preter(超越) + natural = 超越自然的,异常的

pristine.mnemonic: prist(原始) + ine = 原始的,纯净的

privation.mnemonic: priv(剥夺private) + ation = 剥夺,贫困

prodigious.mnemonic: prodig(惊人prodigy) + ious = 惊人的,巨大的

profligate.mnemonic: pro + flig(打击) + ate = 向前打击挥霍,放荡的

propitious.mnemonic: pro + pit(有利) + ious = 有利的,吉祥的

propriety.mnemonic: propri(正确proper) + ety = 正确性,得体

puerile.mnemonic: puer(孩子) + ile = 像孩子一样,幼稚的

pugnacious.mnemonic: pugn(打fight) + acious = 爱打架的,好斗的

punctilious.mnemonic: punct(点punctual) + ilious = 注意每个点的,一丝不苟的

quandary.mnemonic: quan(全) + dary = 全部都很难,困境

quintessential.mnemonic: quint(五) + essential = 第五元素精华,典型的

ramification.mnemonic: ram(分支) + ific + ation = 分支出去,后果

rarefy.mnemonic: rare(稀有) + fy = 使稀有,稀释

ratify.mnemonic: rat(比率) + ify = 按比率确认,批准

rebuke.mnemonic: re + buke(责骂) = 反复责骂,斥责

recant.mnemonic: re + cant(唱歌) = 唱反调,撤回

reciprocate.mnemonic: re + ciproc(来回) + ate = 来回交换,回报

reclusive.mnemonic: re + clus(关闭close) + ive = 关起来的,隐居的

refractory.mnemonic: re + fract(打破) + ory = 反复打破规矩,倔强的

remonstrate.mnemonic: re + monstr(展示monster) + ate = 反复展示不满,抗议

render.mnemonic: rend(给予) + er = 给予,使成为

replete.mnemonic: re + plete(满fill) = 充满的,饱满的

reproach.mnemonic: re + proach(接近approach) = 反复接近批评,责备

reprobate.mnemonic: re + prob(证明) + ate = 反复被否定的,堕落者

repugnant.mnemonic: re + pugn(打fight) + ant = 反抗的,令人厌恶的

requite.mnemonic: re + quite(完全quit) = 完全偿还,报答

resolve.mnemonic: re + solve(解决) = 反复解决,决心

reverberate.mnemonic: re + verber(打击) + ate = 反复打击回响,回荡

revile.mnemonic: re + vile(卑鄙) = 反复说卑鄙话,辱骂

ruminate.mnemonic: rumin(反刍) + ate = 像牛反刍一样,沉思

sagacity.mnemonic: sag(智慧sage) + acity = 智慧,睿智

salutary.mnemonic: salut(健康salute) + ary = 有益健康的,有益的

sanction.mnemonic: sanct(神圣) + ion = 神圣的认可,批准

satiate.mnemonic: sat(满足satisfy) + iate = 使满足,使饱足

saturate.mnemonic: satur(满) + ate = 使饱和,浸透

saunter.mnemonic: saun(散步) + ter = 闲逛,漫步

schism.mnemonic: schis(分裂) + m = 分裂,分歧

scion.mnemonic: sci(知道science) + on = 知识的传承,后代

sedition.mnemonic: sed(分开) + ition = 使分开,煽动叛乱

semblance.mnemonic: sembl(相似resemble) + ance = 相似的外表,外观

servile.mnemonic: serv(服务serve) + ile = 像仆人一样,卑躬屈膝的

solicitous.mnemonic: solicit(请求) + ous = 急于请求的,热切的

somber.mnemonic: som(阴暗) + ber = 阴暗的,忧郁的

somnolent.mnemonic: somn(睡眠) + olent = 想睡的,昏昏欲睡的

sonorous.mnemonic: son(声音sound) + orous = 声音大的,洪亮的

sophisticated.mnemonic: soph(智慧) + istic + ated = 有智慧的,老练的

sordid.mnemonic: sord(脏) + id = 肮脏的,卑鄙的

speculative.mnemonic: specul(观察) + ative = 观察推测的,推测的

spontaneous.mnemonic: spont(自愿) + aneous = 自愿的,自发的

squalid.mnemonic: squal(肮脏) + id = 肮脏的,污秽的

squander.mnemonic: s + wander(游荡) = 钱财游荡走了,浪费

stigmatize.mnemonic: stigma(烙印) + tize = 打上烙印,污名化

stipulate.mnemonic: stipul(规定) + ate = 规定,约定

stoic.mnemonic: stoic(斯多葛) = 像斯多葛派一样,坚忍的

stratagem.mnemonic: strat(军队strategy) + agem = 军事计谋,谋略

stymie.mnemonic: sty(阻止) + mie = 阻止,妨碍

subjugate.mnemonic: sub(在下) + jug(轭yoke) + ate = 放在轭下,征服

sublime.mnemonic: sub + lim(门槛limit) + e = 超过门槛,崇高的

subside.mnemonic: sub(向下) + side(坐) = 向下坐,平息

substantive.mnemonic: sub + stant(站) + ive = 站得住的,实质的

subterfuge.mnemonic: subter(在下) + fuge(逃跑) = 在下面逃跑,诡计

subvert.mnemonic: sub(在下) + vert(转) = 从下面转翻,颠覆

suffice.mnemonic: suf + fic(做make) + e = 做得够,足够

sumptuous.mnemonic: sumpt(花费) + uous = 花费多的,奢华的
